content:
Hi #rustdoc , how do you feel about the stable backport of this?
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/90489

it was approved for beta-backport last week, the stable-backport was deferred to this week. We are about two weeks from next beta and stable release.
Does it make sense now to stable backport it?
I think if no decision is taken, we can do nothing (ie, not backporting) and wait for the normal release process
